name: The Scarab Gauntlet: An Indie Video Game
blurb: Dive into the dangerous, exciting dream world of The Scarab Gauntlet as Amanda struggles to rescue her father.

rewards.reward: "Gnarly Gnarlington"\r\nEvery dollar matters, and we'll give you a shout-out on the website as our way of saying thank you. You can be a part in helping bring our little game to life.

"Battle-Tested Bayonets"\r\n\r\nFor $10, you get the above reward, as well as your name in the credits of the game, and  the HD PC version of the game, which will be available as a download from our website.

"Riding a Mercury Surfboard"\r\n\r\nFor $25, you get all of the above rewards, plus the digital soundtrack with bonus tracks for all you music aficionados, and well as the digital artbook, which has behind-the-scenes art that show how we crafted the game. The bonus tracks and art are exclusively through Kickstarter.

"Tiger's Blood and Adonis DNA"\r\n\r\nFor $50, you get all of the above rewards, as well as a signed T-shirt (S,M,L, or XL) with our main character, Amanda, in a fierce action pose. Shipping included, $5 extra to ship to Canada, and $10 extra to ship internationally.

"You're an F-18, bro"\r\n\r\nFor $100, you get all of the above rewards, plus 8 \u00bd x 11, signed, full color prints of any three concept art pieces shown on our Kickstarter. Shipping included, $5 extra to ship to Canada, and $10 extra to ship internationally.

"Magic Warlock Art"\r\n\r\nFor $250,  you get all of the rewards on the above tiers, plus a hardcopy of the soundtrack, and  a custom piece of concept art that makes you look like any character in the game. It will be a fully colored, digital, and signed piece. We will also print it on 8\u00bd x 11 photo paper, frame it, mat it, and ship it to you. Shipping to US included. (Shipping to Canada add $10, and International add $15 to pledge amount)

"Winning, Duh"\r\n\r\nFor $500, you get every reward above, a printed copy of the artbook, and you get to design a unique area in the game that we will make. Think of cool scenes from movies- like the carbonite freezing chamber in The Empire Strikes Back where Luke fights Vader. Shipping to US included. (Shipping to Canada add $10, and International add $15 to pledge amount)

"High Priest Vatican Assassin Warlock"

For $1000, you receive all of the above rewards, plus you get to design a character, which we will then put into the game itself! You won't be able to actually play as the character, but they will make a cameo and and you will get to see your creation in the game.
Shipping to US included. (Shipping to Canada add $10, and International add $15 to pledge amount)
